availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William W. Watkins (Whitley County, Kentucky soldier)

body.p: Whitley County, Kentucky, soldier. Served in the 7th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Private from September 22, 1861 to October 31 1861. Served in the 7th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as Commissary Sergeant from October 31, 1861 to January 31, 1863.

ab.bibl: Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of Kentucky, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 219.
